alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dona Ana and northwestern El Paso Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 639 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West El Paso, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Blowing dust and brief low visibilities are possible. Locations impacted include... West El Paso, Northeast El Paso, Central El Paso, Santa Teresa, Anthony, Sunland Park, Canutillo, Westway, Vinton, La Union, Chamberino, Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal and Franklin Mountains State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico near mile marker 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
